# Waves of Fatigue (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 368

Waves of negative energy render all living creatures in the spellâ€™s area [[Fatigued|fatigued]]. This spell has no effect on a creature that is already [[Fatigued|fatigued]].
